oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soldiers leaving on a truck from the signals station on Vung Chua Mountain

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Five soldiers sitting in the back of an open truck. One is drinking from a can. At left, a partially visible soldier holds n apple. Two others stand nearby with their backs to the camera.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military vehicles; Rifles; Trucks; Military personnel; Soldiers; Men; Military uniforms
Vietnam War, 1961-1975; Ammons, Christopher D., 1948- ; Vung Chua Mountain (Vietnam); M-16 rifle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ammons, Christopher D., 1948-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Vung Chua Mountain site, just north of Qui Nhon, required the construction of thousands of feet of new road and the removal of an enormous amount of rock and dirt. This work provided a flat surface on which the facility could be built.
